snippet: The criminal charge, filed by a senior member of the Bharatiya Janata Party, claims that Sonia and Rahul Gandhi illegally gained control over real estate that is worth hundreds of millions of dollars.
abstract: Indian National Congress leaders Sonia and Rahul Gandhi appear in court to apply for bail on corruption charges filed against them by member of rival Bharatiya Janata Party; mother and son, political dynasts whose party has been out of power for almost two years, deny allegations they benefited financially from closing of party newspaper.
lead_paragraph: The criminal charge, filed by a senior member of the Bharatiya Janata Party, claims that Sonia and Rahul Gandhi illegally gained control over real estate that is worth hundreds of millions of dollars.

headline.main: Gandhi Family Vows to Fight Corruption Case Filed by Political Rival
headline.print_headline: Gandhi Family Pledges to Fight Corruption Case Filed by a Political Rival
